pullRequest.title: Issue #5032 - Minimal Extensible Web App changes
pullRequest.bodyText:
Replacing PR #5033 as a minimal set of changes to allow for extensible Web Apps.
Either as WebAppContext or a ServletContextHandler.
Signed-off-by: Joakim Erdfelt joakim.erdfelt@gmail.com

nodes.bodyText: The ServletHolder does these two operations in the opposite order.  However, I think the order here is correct, so the servlet holder needs to be changed to do the same order.
I'd be OK with FilterWrapper and changing the existing servlet one to match.
Should probably move this javadoc detail to the holder specific WrapFunction javadoc.

I really don't understand why you have this templated over C when the class itself is already templated over T?
When will C and T ever  be different types?
I don't love this signature.... but I'd like it a lot more with javadoc!
